column5: Going down to a bills game next month. Last time it took us longer to get out of the parking lot then it did to cross the boarder. Don't want to hoof it for 5kms but I don't want to spend an hour and a half moving at the speed of Rob Johnson's progressions.  Send me a pm if you have a spot that you are willing to share.  Thanks.
That's strange. Whenever I've gone down to Minneapolis to watch a Vikes game, I pay for parking but getting out isn't a big ordeal. Takes maybe 15 minutes at best. And I park minutes from the dome.
If you watch from your couch, you don't even have to drive....
You and 80,000 other fans are also looking for that secret spot.....LOL  Do you want to tailgate and party or just get in and out ? ? ?
I think you either deal with the traffic or walk for 5k and still deal with traffic. Best advise I have is to park so you can go straight off the curb onto the road.
Sort of like watching fishing shows or going fishing.    in and out
